links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..6
mathematica: a=2;lst={};Do[a=a^n;AppendTo[lst,a],{n,1,7}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, May 26 2009 *)Table[2^n!,{n,0,9}] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 16 2012 *)
prog: (MAGMA) [2^Factorial(n): n in [0..8]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 16 2012(Maxima) makelist(2^(n!),n,0,5); /* _Martin Ettl_, Dec 27 2012 */
